revised_title: Assessment of Local Isotropy and Universality in Turbulent Shear Flows
tldr: The authors examine the degree to which local isotropy and universality apply to scalar fields in turbulent shear flows. They discuss Kolmogorov's similarity theory and its modifications, and assess the relevant experimental evidence. The study focuses on the scaling properties of the fluctuating scalar field and the energy dissipation rate in high-Reynolds-number turbulent flows.
